author: Special Correspondent
text:
Desiya Murpokku Dravida Kazhagam (DMDK) president Vijayakant on Sunday extended his wishes to Amit Shah on his appointment as BJP national president for a second term.

In a letter, he said the country had witnessed Mr. Shah’s enormous contribution in strengthening the party at the national level and expressed confidence that the leader would fulfil the wishes of the cadre in his new term. Top party leaders led by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, proposed his name for the party president’s post.
title: Vijayakant greets Amit Shah
